action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Donald J. Trump Wealth Tax Act of 2017
This bill imposes a 14.25% tax on any U.S. citizen, resident, or applicable trust with a net worth that exceeds $10 million. The tax applies to the portion of the net worth that exceeds $10 million, excluding the value of any principal residence and its indebtedness.
